FindTheCulprit.MissingDependency: {module} requires a module with ID {dependency} as a dependency, which is not installed!
FindTheCulprit.DisabledDependency: {module} requires {dependency} as a dependency, which is not enabled!

BinarySearchStep.StatsData: Step {currentStep}: {numRemaining} unlocked modules still in the list. {stepsLeft} or fewer steps remain.

Error.Singleton: Only one FindTheCulprit app is allowed to exist.

FoundTheCulprit.HasSelected: You have {count} modules selected, any of which may be your true culprit. Otherwise, it's:

IPWOS.BlameModules: , or in your selected module list:
IPWOS.BlameCoreOrSystem: Seems like the issue is a bug in the game system or the core software

Tooltip.Enabled: All modules marked as libraries are force locked.
Tooltip.Disabled: Library modules are being treated normally.

Tooltip.Enabled: All connected clients will reload along with the GM
Tooltip.Disabled: Only the GM client will reload

clearAll.Label: Clear All
clearAll.Tooltip: Sets every module to unlocked and unselected

Tooltip.Locked: This module is locked. Click to unlock it.
Tooltip.Unlocked: This module is unlocked. Click to lock it. Locked status is remembered.
Tooltip.Forced: This module cannot be unlocked while the Lock Libraries toggle is enabled.

SelectMods.DisabledBecauseLocked: To deselect this module, unlock it first.
SelectMods.ForceLockedBecauseLibraryTooltip: This module cannot be unlocked while the Lock Libraries toggle is enabled.
SelectMods.LockedTooltip: This module is locked. Click to unlock it.
SelectMods.LibrariesLockedTooltip: All modules marked as libraries are force locked.
SelectMods.LibrariesUnlockedTooltip: Library modules are being treated normally.
SelectMods.DoReloadAllClientsTooltip: All connected clients will reload along with the GM
SelectMods.DontReloadAllClientsTooltip: Only the GM client will reload
SelectMods.UnlockedTooltip: This module is unlocked. Click to lock it. Locked status is remembered.

Usage.P1: After clicking Start, the page will refresh and you will be prompted to check whether your issue still exists. This may repeat multiple times until the culprit was found.
Usage.P2: After the culprit was found you will be able to choose whether you want to return your active modules list to its pre-run state.
Usage.P3: Don't worry if you accidently close one of the popups, just refresh the page manually and it will reappear.

StartOfRun.AllModulesDeactivated: All modules except Find the Culprit are deactivated.
StartOfRun.AllButSelectedDeactivated: All modules, except those selected and FtC itself, are deactivated. Searching will take at most {maxSteps} steps.
